Class Admin

java.lang.Object
Employee
Admin
public class Admin
extends Employee
This class represents the admin, and has all of the admin only functions
Author:
Refined Storage developers

    • Admin

      public Admin​(int id, java.lang.String user_name, java.lang.String pw, int prio)
      This constructor sets the passed parameters as variables
      Parameters:
      id - - id in use
      user_name - - name in use
      pw - - password in use
      prio - - role in use

  • Method Details

    • add_user

      public int add_user​(DbFunctions Db, java.lang.String role, int i, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      This method is used to add a new user to the table users
      Parameters:
      Db - - the corresponding database
      role - - string with the role that is to be assigned to the user: admin, employee
      i - - integer with the id that is to be assigned to the user
      name - - string with the name that is to be assigned to the user
      password - - string with the password that is to be assigned to the user
      Returns:
      integer: 0 if was correctly added, 1 if the id is currently being used, 2 if it is an invalid id, 3- if it is an invalid role, 4 if there is an error

    • rem_user

      public int rem_user​(DbFunctions Db, int i2, Refined_storage Rs)
      This method is used to remove a user that is currently in the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      i2 - - integer with the user id that is to be removed
      Rs - - the refined storage
      Returns:
      integer: 0 if it was correctly removed, 1 if it the id isn't present, 2 if it is an invalid user, 3 if error

    • list_users

      public java.sql.ResultSet list_users​(DbFunctions Db)
      This method is used to list all the users in the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      Returns:
      result set with the users

    • add_item_to_db

      public int add_item_to_db​(DbFunctions Db, int i, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String brand, int quantity, java.lang.String date)
      This method is used to add a material to the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      i - - integer with the id of the new material
      name - - string with the name of the new material
      brand - - string with the brand of the new material
      quantity - - string with the quantity of the new material
      date - - string with the date that the material is being added
      Returns:
      integer: 0 that added correctly, 1- if the id is already in use, 2- if the id is invalid, 3 if error

    • remove_item_from_db

      public int remove_item_from_db​(DbFunctions Db, int i2)
      This method is used to remove a material from the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      i2 - - integer with the id that is to be removed
      Returns:
      integer: 0 if removed correctly, 1 if the id is invalid or is not being used, 2 if error

    • list_orders

      public java.lang.String[][] list_orders​(DbFunctions Db)
      This method is used to list the orders present in the database
      Parameters:
      Db - - the database
      Returns:
      string with the values of all of the orders present in the database
